start.no-collaborations: Your organization is not part of any collaborations yet. Please contact your vantage6 project manager to set up a collaboration or go to the administration section to create a new collaboration.

task.name: Name
task.alert-node-offline: The node '{{name}}' is offline. This task will be handled when the node is back online.

task-run.alert-node-offline: Task can't start, node is offline.

task-create.title: Create task

description.algorithm: Select which algorithm you want to run
description.name: Provide a suitable name for your task
description.description: Optionally, describe your task so you can find it back later

description.function: Select which function you want to run
description.organization-central: Select the organization that will run this function. Note that you have selected a central function, which will probably create subtasks for other organizations in the collaboration
description.organization-partial: Select the organizations that will carry out a partial function

step-database.title: Select databases

description.database: Select the database(s) you want to use. The options in the dropdown represent the database labels defined in the node configuration file.
description.query: This database is a {{dbType}} database. Provide a query to select the data
description.worksheet: This database is an Excel file. Provide the name of the worksheet to use

step-database.error-db-update: Could not retrieve node configuration. The database step will not be available. Please try again later.

step-parameters.title: Define parameters
step-parameters.description: Provide parameter values for the selected algorithm function

task-create.alert-no-online-nodes: You cannot create a task right now because no nodes are online in your collaboration. Online nodes are required to collect information on available databases and columns. Please try again later or contact your collaboration manager.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the task '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all subtasks and results.
This operation cannot be undone.

kill-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to kill the task '{{name}}'?
kill-dialog.content:
Note, this will also kill all subtasks.
This operation cannot be undone.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to remove the algorithm store '{{name}}' from the collaboration '{{collaboration}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Users will no longer be able to create tasks in this collaboration with the algorithms in this store.
The algorithm store can be added back to the collaboration at any time.

api-key-download-dialog.title: API key download
api-key-download-dialog.create-message: The API keys have been downloaded.
api-key-download-dialog.edit-message: The API keys for the new organizations in the collaboration have been downloaded.
api-key-download-dialog.reset-message: Your API key has been reset. Please read your new key in the file that has been downloaded.
api-key-download-dialog.security-message: Please distribute each of these keys privately to each of the organizations. Note that they may reset their API key so that no-one but them knows it.

card-algorithm-stores.title: Algorithm stores available to this collaboration

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the collaboration '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all nodes and tasks related to this collaboration.
This operation cannot be undone.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the study '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all tasks related to this study.
This operation cannot be undone.

algorithm-store-add.title: Add algorithm store to your collaboration
algorithm-store-add.name: Name

form.name-hint: This name will be used to identify the algorithm store in your collaboration(s).
form.url-hint: The web address of the algorithm store. This should be the address of the algorithm store without '/api' at the end.
form.server-url-hint: The web address of this vantage6 server. This should be the address of the vantage6 server's including the API path.
form.all-collaborations: Make this algorithm store available to all collaborations

localhost-dialog.title: Adding localhost algorithm store
localhost-dialog.content: You are adding an algorithm store running on localhost. This is insecure and should only be done for development servers. Are you sure you want to continue?

role-read.title: view
role-read.no-users: No users have been assigned to the selected role.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the user '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all tasks this user created.
This operation cannot be undone.

lost.title: Lost your password?
lost.instruction: Fill in your username *or* email address in order to reset your password.

recover.title: Enter your reset token and new password
recover.message: Enter the reset token you received at your registered email address and choose a new password.

setup.title: Setup two-factor authentication
setup.message: Your system administrator requires you to set up two-factor authentication. Scan the QR code below with your favorite authenticator app to set this up.
setup.recommend: You may use your favorite authentication app. We recommend using Lastpass or Google authenticator.

manual.title: Setup two-factor authentication manually
manual.message: If you are having difficulties scanning the QR code, please enter the following code manually in your authentication app:

lost.title: Lost your code?
lost.instruction: In order to reset your two-factor authentication code, you need to get a reset token. You will receive this at your registered email address.

recover.title: Enter your reset token
recover.message: Enter the reset token you received at your registered email address.

success-dialog.title: Password changed
success-dialog.message: Your password has been changed successfully.

validation.unequal: New password cannot be the same as the old password
validation.roles-unavailable: Select an organization to determine available roles
validation.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.pattern: Password must contain a lowercase letter, uppercase letter, number and special character
